title: The Danish Girl
sinopse: A fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.
author: Tom Hooper

title: Bridesmaids
sinopse: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.
author: Paul Feig

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
sinopse: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
author: Gore Verbinski

title: Vacation
sinopse: Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.
author: John Francis Daley

sinopse: A closeted young man goes home for the holidays and struggles to reveal his dire circumstances to his conservative family.
author: Yen Tan

title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
sinopse: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the future of Panem.
author: Francis Lawrence

title: Apollo 13
sinopse: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.
author: Ron Howard

title: Unsane
sinopse: A young woman is involuntarily committed to a mental institution, where she is confronted by her greatest fear--but is it real or a product of her delusion?
author: Steven Soderbergh

title: Antidote
sinopse: An altruistic doctor (Natali Yura) and cocky treasure hunters (Randy Couture) and (Chuck Zito) must join forces to uncover the Mayan legend of the White Witch.
author: Ken Barbet
